1.Title: Barrel - Part 1
1.Transcript:
[[A boy sits in a barrel which is floating in an ocean.]]
Boy: I wonder where I'll float next?
[[The barrel drifts into the distance. Nothing else can be seen.]]
{{Alt: Don't we all.}}

2.Alt: 'Petit' being a reference to Le Petit Prince, which I only thought about halfway through the sketch
2.Title: Petit Trees (sketch)
2.Transcript:
[[Two trees are growing on opposite sides of a sphere.]]
{{Alt-title: 'Petit' being a reference to Le Petit Prince, which I only thought about halfway through the sketch}}

4.Alt: There's a river flowing through the ocean
4.Title: Landscape (sketch)
4.Transcript:
[[A sketch of a landscape with sun on the horizon]]
{{Alt: There's a river flowing through the ocean}}
